38 class LocalMediaSource : public aace::core::PlatformInterface {
39 public:
43  enum class Source {
47  BLUETOOTH,
51  USB,
55  FM_RADIO,
59  AM_RADIO,
63  SATELLITE_RADIO,
67  LINE_IN,
71  COMPACT_DISC,
75  SIRIUS_XM,
79  DAB
80  };
81 
85  enum class ContentSelector {
89  FREQUENCY,
93  CHANNEL,
97  PRESET
98  };

105  using MediaType = ExternalMediaAdapter::MediaType;

380 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const LocalMediaSource::Source& source) {
381  switch (source) {
382  case LocalMediaSource::Source::BLUETOOTH:
383  stream << "BLUETOOTH";
384  break;
385  case LocalMediaSource::Source::USB:
386  stream << "USB";
387  break;
388  case LocalMediaSource::Source::FM_RADIO:
389  stream << "FM_RADIO";
390  break;
391  case LocalMediaSource::Source::AM_RADIO:
392  stream << "AM_RADIO";
393  break;
394  case LocalMediaSource::Source::SATELLITE_RADIO:
395  stream << "SATELLITE_RADIO";
396  break;
397  case LocalMediaSource::Source::LINE_IN:
398  stream << "LINE_IN";
399  break;
400  case LocalMediaSource::Source::COMPACT_DISC:
401  stream << "COMPACT_DISC";
402  break;
403  case LocalMediaSource::Source::SIRIUS_XM:
404  stream << "SIRIUS_XM";
405  break;
406  case LocalMediaSource::Source::DAB:
407  stream << "DAB";
408  break;
409  }
410  return stream;
411 }
412 
413 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const LocalMediaSource::ContentSelector& contentSelectorType) {
414  switch (contentSelectorType) {
415  case LocalMediaSource::ContentSelector::CHANNEL:
416  stream << "CHANNEL";
417  break;
418  case LocalMediaSource::ContentSelector::FREQUENCY:
419  stream << "FREQUENCY";
420  break;
421  case LocalMediaSource::ContentSelector::PRESET:
422  stream << "PRESET";
423  break;
424  }
425  return stream;
426 }
